alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 5:56AM CDT until June 15 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Forest County in northeastern Wisconsin... Northwestern Florence County in northeastern Wisconsin... * Until 615 AM CDT. * At 556 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Tipler, or 13 miles southwest of Iron River, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wisconsin Slough Natural Area around 605 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
